title: How to use Mockito to supercharge your Java Testing
content: Mockito is a powerful and easy-to-use mocking framework for Java applications. With Mockito, you can easily create mock objects that simulate the behavior of real objects in your application, without actually invoking their methods. We will show at first how to plug Mockito in JUnit Tests. Then, we will integrate Mockito in Quarkus Tests. Mockito ...  The post appeared first on .
